topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Deploy the Accelerate PID Patch

body.p: This patch resolves the issue Failed to launch the accelerated daemon encountered in the hlm deploy process during installation.
body.section:
Download the patch
If you have not downloaded the patch, launch the Helion Distribution Network (HDN). You must obtain a user account on HDN in order to download these files. In a browser, navigate to Helion Download Network(HDN).
Click Sign In to log in using your account.
After signing in, click the Downloads link in the menu on the left side of the page.
Download the patch and the associated checksum and signature files.
Verify the downloaded signature and the downloaded checksums.
Extract the compressed file until the knc-accelerate-pid.patch file and README are available:
Extract the HCG2.0_Accelerate001_Patch023.tar.gz compressed file.
Extract the HCG2.0_Accelerate001_Patch023.tar compressed file.

ol.li:
Log onto the lifecycle manager VM.ssh <lifecycle manager_VM_IP>
where: lifecycle manager_VM_IP is the CLM IP of the lifecycle manager. Locate the IP address for the lifecycle manager in the /root/infra-ansible-playbooks/group_vars/all file under hlm_clmstaticip field.
Copy the knc-accelerate-pid.patch file to the ~/ directory.
Execute the following command to deploy the patch: patch -p1 -b < ../knc-accelerate-pid.patch
Execute the following command to integrate the changes into the environment:./hlm_prepare-env.sh
Execute the following command: hlm generate -c <cloud name>
